item.title: 印尼将前部长和 Gojek 创始人作为贪污案嫌疑人拘留
item.description: 印尼调查人员周四将前教育部长、打车公司 Gojek 联合创始人纳迪姆-马卡里姆（Nadiem Makarim）列为一起涉嫌不当采购笔记本电脑的腐败案件的嫌疑人，并表示他已被拘留。【原文：Indonesian investigators on Thursday named a former education minister and co-founder of ride-hailing firm Gojek, Nadiem Makarim, as a suspect in a corruption case about alleged improper laptop procurement and said he had been detained.】

item.title: Figma 股价暴跌，原因是盈利低于上市后的高预期
item.description: Figma 公司第一季度盈利小幅增长，低于其 7 月份上市时的超高预期，股价在周四的盘前交易中下跌超过 15%。【原文：Figma's shares fell more than 15% in premarket trading on Thursday following a modest first-quarter earnings beat that fell short of the sky-high expectations set by its blockbuster July stock debut.】

item.title: 早间竞价债券反弹，科技股上涨
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 马来西亚推动 TikTok 进行年龄验证以保护未成年人
item.description: 马来西亚已敦促视频共享平台 TikTok 对用户实施年龄验证，此前还传唤了该公司的高层管理人员，要求加快行动遏制有害内容。【原文：Malaysia has urged the video-sharing platform TikTok to implement age verification for users after summoning the firm's top management to demand faster action to curb harmful content.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 VinFast 因雄心勃勃的增长战略投入巨资，季度亏损扩大
item.description: 越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast 周四公布，第二季度净亏损扩大，原因是该公司加大了全球扩张和营销方面的支出，以刺激需求并支持其雄心勃勃的增长战略。【原文：Vietnamese electric-vehicle maker VinFast on Thursday reported a wider second-quarter net loss as it stepped up spending on global expansion and marketing to spur demand and support its ambitious growth strategy.】

item.title: 印度提高服装税可能使全球时尚品牌受挫
item.description: 印度对消费税的全面改革将使从肥皂到豪华 SUV 的所有产品都变得更加便宜，但 Zara、Levi Strauss 和 Lacoste 等全球时尚品牌却因对所有售价超过 29 美元的服装征收更高的税款而受到了惊吓。【原文：India's overhaul of consumer tax stands to make everything from soaps to luxury SUVs cheaper, but global fashion brands such as Zara, Levi Strauss and Lacoste have been spooked by higher levies on all apparel priced at more than $29.】

item.title: 墨西哥 BMV 集团计划推出亚马逊等主要美股期权
item.description: 墨西哥主要证券交易所运营商首席执行官告诉路透社，该公司计划在今年年底前上市亚马逊、苹果和其他大公司等主要美股的期权。【原文：Mexico's main stock exchange operator plans to list options on major U.S. stocks such as Amazon , Apple and other big names by the end of this year, its chief executive told Reuters.】

item.title: 美股期货在薪资报告公布前表现低迷；Salesforce下跌
item.description: 周四，美国股指期货走势低迷，投资者在等待一份非公开的薪资报告，而 Salesforce 的股价则在营收预期下调后出现下跌。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were subdued on Thursday as investors awaited a private payrolls report, while Salesforce shares declined after a downbeat revenue forecast.】

item.title: 独家报道加密货币工作者遭遇朝鲜黑客围攻
item.description: 根据新的研究、原始数据和访谈，朝鲜黑客正在向加密货币行业提供听起来可信的工作机会，作为其窃取数字现金活动的一部分。【原文：North Korean hackers are saturating the cryptocurrency industry with credible-sounding job offers as part of their campaign to steal digital cash, according to new research, raw data, and interviews.】

item.title: 美国参议院就特朗普提名的米兰举行听证会，美联储独立性成为焦点
item.description: 周四，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的经济顾问斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）将在参议院银行委员会的听证会上就其在美国中央银行七人管理委员会中的提名作证，届时有关美联储独立性的问题将成为焦点。【原文：Questions about Federal Reserve independence will take center stage on Thursday, when President Donald Trump's economic advisor Stephen Miran testifies at a Senate Banking Committee hearing on his nomination to the U.S. central bank's seven-member governing board.】

item.title: 谷歌裁决显示科技如何超越反垄断执法
item.description: 科技世界尤其是人工智能领域的飞速发展促使法官对遏制谷歌的在线搜索垄断采取了谨慎的态度，这也揭示了美国反垄断执法者在其他针对大科技公司的案件中获胜的一个障碍。【原文：The rapid pace of development in the world of tech, particularly in AI, spurred a judge's cautious approach to curbing Google's online search monopoly, revealing a hurdle for U.S. antitrust enforcers' efforts to win their other cases against Big Tech.】

item.title: 收入预期疲软预示人工智能回报延迟，Salesforce 股价下跌
item.description: 周四收盘前，Salesforce 股价下跌近 7%，此前这家云软件供应商第三季度营收预期疲软，暗示其人工智能投资回报延迟。【原文：Salesforce shares dropped nearly 7% before the bell on Thursday, after the cloud software provider's weak third-quarter revenue forecast hinted at delayed returns from its AI investments.】

item.title: 亚马逊完成 Axio 收购，获得印度直接借贷许可
item.description: 亚马逊周四表示，它已完成对总部位于班加罗尔的非银行贷款机构 Axio 的收购，收购金额未披露，从而获得了印度的直接贷款牌照。【原文：Amazon said on Thursday that it has completed the acquisition of Bengaluru-based non-bank lender Axio for an undisclosed amount, securing a direct lending licence in India.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称需要数字欧元应对重大干扰
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）董事会成员皮埃罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）周四表示，需要一种数字版欧元，以便欧元区居民在银行受到网络攻击等干扰时仍能继续支付。【原文：A digital version of the euro is needed so that residents of the euro zone can continue to make payments even during disruptions such as cyberattacks on banks, European Central Bank board member Piero Cipollone said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国之鹰因悉尼-斯威尼（Sydney Sweeney）广告激起需求而飙升
item.description: 由于演员悉尼-斯威尼（Sydney Sweeney）和美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）明星特拉维斯-凯尔斯（Travis Kelce）为美国鹰牌服饰公司（American Eagle Outfitters）的牛仔裤和服装拍摄了备受瞩目的广告，刺激了市场需求，该公司股价在周四的盘前交易中飙升近 24%。【原文：Shares of American Eagle Outfitters soared nearly 24% in premarket trading on Thursday as high-profile ad campaigns for its jeans and apparel with actor Sydney Sweeney and National Football League (NFL) star Travis Kelce, spurred demand.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，日本和美国即将达成降低汽车关税的协议
item.description: 一位日本政府消息人士周四告诉路透社，日本和美国正在进行最后阶段的谈判，以便在美国总统行政命令发布后的10-14天内降低日本汽车进口关税。【原文：Japan and the United States are in the final stages of talks to implement lower tariffs on Japanese automobile imports within 10-14 days after the issuance of a U.S. presidential executive order, a Japanese government source told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 贝莱德前债务主管警告 "秃鹫 "正在盘旋玻利维亚危机
item.description: 资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）新兴市场债务部门前主管、玻利维亚最著名的总统之一的孙子表示愿意帮助下月总统选举的获胜者解决该国的债务问题。【原文：The former head of emerging-market debt at asset manager BlackRock and grandson of one of Bolivia's most famous presidents is offering to help the winner of next month's presidential election fix the country's debt problems.】

item.title: 政府和监督机构称，谷歌在土耳其和欧洲部分地区部分瘫痪
item.description: 土耳其电信部副部长和一名当地互联网监测员称，土耳其和欧洲部分地区周四无法访问包括 YouTube 在内的一些谷歌服务。【原文：Some Google services including YouTube were not accessible in Turkey and some parts of Europe on Thursday, the Turkish deputy minister for telecommunications and a local internet monitor said.】

item.title: 欧洲有哪些由退伍军人创办的国防初创企业？
item.description: 随着欧洲各国国防开支的增加，许多国防技术初创企业在其创始人的军事经验支持下实现了强劲增长。【原文：With a rise in defence spending by European countries, many defence technology startups are seeing robust growth, supported by their founders' military experience.】

item.title: 乌克兰战争引发投资热潮，退伍军人引领欧洲国防科技革命
item.description: 前德国军官马特-库珀斯（Matt Kuppers）对奥地利一家初创公司的反无人机武器系统进行评估时，他的军事眼光发现了年轻的平民创始人所忽略的问题：加热枪管在反复发射后会失去精度。【原文：When former German army officer Matt Kuppers evaluated an Austrian startup's anti-drone weapons system, his military eye spotted what the young civilian founders had missed: the heated gun barrel lost accuracy after repeated firings.】

item.title: 试验性抗炎药物试验结果不佳，赛诺菲股价下挫逾 9
item.description: 法国制药商赛诺菲的实验性炎症性疾病药物阿利替尼单抗的后期试验数据低于华尔街预期，该公司股价周四下跌超过9%。【原文：Shares in French drugmaker Sanofi fell more than 9% on Thursday after late-stage trial data for its experimental inflammatory disease drug amlitelimab fell short of Wall Street expectations.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司 8 月份销量下降 9
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周四表示，该公司 8 月份共售出 48029 辆汽车，同比下降 9%。【原文：Volvo Cars sold 48,029 cars in August, down 9% from a year earlier, the Sweden-based company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 南非糖农面临特朗普关税和廉价进口产品的 "双重打击
item.description: Nkosinathi Msweli 的甘蔗农场位于 KwaDukuza（南非东部沿海的一个农村地区，主要是贫困地区），30 年来一直是一个稳固的经济成功故事，尽管规模不大，但雇用了 8 名全职员工和 30 名季节工。【原文：Nkosinathi Msweli's sugar cane farm in KwaDukuza - a rural, largely poor region on South Africa's eastern coast - has for three decades been a solid, albeit small, economic success story, employing eight full-time staff and 30 seasonal workers.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，尽管政府施压不买，但中国企业仍想要英伟达芯片
item.description: 阿里巴巴、字节跳动和其他中国科技公司仍然热衷于英伟达的人工智能芯片，尽管北京的监管机构极力阻止它们进行此类采购。【原文：Alibaba , ByteDance and other Chinese tech firms remain keen on Nvidia's artificial intelligence chips despite regulators in Beijing strongly discouraging them from such purchases, four people with knowledge of procurement discussions said.】

item.title: KKR 以 5.28 亿美元收购韩国三和公司
item.description: Samhwa 周四表示，总部位于美国的 KKR 已从 TPG 手中收购了韩国化妆品包装公司 Samhwa Co，交易价值为 7330 亿韩元（约合 5.28 亿美元）。【原文：U.S.-based KKR has acquired South Korea's cosmetics packaging company Samhwa Co from TPG in a deal valued at 733 billion Korean won ($528 million), Samhwa said on Thursday.】

item.title: 摩根大通将于 2026 年在德国推出德国数字零售银行
item.description: 摩根大通周四表示，将于明年第二季度在德国推出大通数字零售银行。【原文：JPMorganChase said on Thursday that it would launch its Chase digital retail bank in Germany in the second quarter of next year.】

item.title: 早间竞标日本债务拍卖顺利通过
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特（Gregor Stuart Hunter）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望 随着美联储成员发出支持降息的声音，以及日本最新的超长期债务拍卖顺利通过，惶恐不安的债券市场找到了平静的理由。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter Jittery bond markets found reasons for calm as members of the Federal Reserve sounded a supportive note for rate cuts and Japan's latest super-long debt auction passed without incident.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，埃克森美孚考虑出售欧洲化工厂
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周四援引知情人士的话报道称，埃克森美孚正在寻求出售其在英国和比利时的欧洲化工厂，因为该行业正受到美国关税和中国竞争的影响。【原文：ExxonMobil is seeking to offload its European chemical plants in the UK and Belgium as the sector reels from the impact of U.S. tariffs and competition from China, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国劳埃德银行将使数千名员工面临被解雇的风险
item.description: 英国劳埃德银行集团（Lloyds Banking Group）首席执行官查理-纳恩（Charlie Nunn）告诉路透社，由于该集团正在削减成本，约有 3,000 名被评为业绩最差的 5% 的员工将被考虑解雇。【原文：Around 3,000 people at Britain's Lloyds Banking Group , judged to be among the bottom 5%, will find themselves considered for possible dismissal, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters, as CEO Charlie Nunn pursues cost cuts.】

item.title: 在线杂货商 Rohlik 考虑上市，押注服务和广告业务
item.description: Rohlik 公司创始人兼首席执行官 Tomas Cupr 在接受路透社采访时说，由于欧洲消费者仍持谨慎态度，总部位于布拉格的在线杂货商 Rohlik 集团正在通过向其他零售商提供服务和向食品品牌出售广告空间来增加利润，同时考虑可能进行首次公开募股。【原文：With European consumers still cautious, Prague-based online grocer Rohlik Group is bolstering its profit by offering services to other retailers and selling advertising space to food brands as it considers a possible initial public offering, Rohlik founder and chief executive Tomas Cupr told Reuters in an interview.】
